attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2008-1794

Date: 2008-11-28

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the

salary of Kevin MacLeod, Usher of the Black Rod, Senate,

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GC 3 ($90,000 - $105,900), effective May 26, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Daniel Plourde, former Acting Secretary, North American Free

Trade Agreement (NAFTA) Secretariat, Canadian Section,

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GC 4 ($103,400 - $121,700), effective April 11, 2008.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Alain Beaudet, President, Canadian Institutes of Health Research, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range

GC 10 ($239,100 - $281,300), effective July 1, 2008.

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Clare Beckton, Coordinator, Office of the Coordinator (Status of Women Canada), as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 7 ($157,300 - $185,100), effective April 1, 2008.

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Marc Bosc, Deputy Clerk, House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 6 ($136,800 - $160,900), effective April 1, 2008.

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Marie-Andrée Lajoie, Clerk Assistant (Procedure and Administration), House of Commons, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range GC 5 ($119,000 - $140,000), effective April 1, 2008.
